                                  java.lang.String logDir,
                                  boolean samFormat)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Count total number of mapped reads in a sam or bam file

Parameters:
samtoolsExecutable - Samtools executable file
samFile - The sam file
logDir - Directory to write log information to
samFormat - True if sam format, false if bam format
Returns:
The alignment count obtained by running the command "samtools view -c -F 4"
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException

countAlignments

public static int countAlignments(java.lang.String samtoolsExecutable,
                                  java.lang.String samFile,
                                  java.lang.String logDir,
                                  boolean countUnmapped,
                                  boolean samFormat)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
Count total number of mapped or unmapped reads in a sam file

Parameters:
samtoolsExecutable - Samtools executable file
samFile - The sam file
logDir - Directory to write log information to
countUnmapped - True if counting unmapped reads, false if counting mapped reads
samFormat - True if sam format, false if bam format
Returns:
The alignment count obtained by running the command "samtools view -c -F 4"
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException

                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Run bowtie2 with unpaired reads and default max insert size

Parameters:
bowtie2IndexBase - Index filename prefix (minus trailing .X.bt2)
options -
reads - Fastq file containing unpaired reads
outSamFile - Output sam file
outUnalignedFastq - Output fastq file for unaligned reads or null
bowtie2Executable - Bowtie2 executable
bsubOutDir - Output directory for bsub file
Returns:
The bsub job ID
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException

runBowtie2

public static java.lang.String runBowtie2(java.lang.String bowtie2IndexBase,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                                          java.lang.String read1Fastq,
                                          java.lang.String read2Fastq,
                                          java.lang.String outSamFile,
                                          java.lang.String outUnalignedFastq,
                                          java.lang.String bowtie2Executable,
                                          java.lang.String bsubOutDir)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Run bowtie2 with paired reads and default max insert size

Parameters:
bowtie2IndexBase - Index filename prefix (minus trailing .X.bt2)
options - Bowtie2 option flags and values
read1Fastq - Fastq file containing read1 if paired or single end reads if unpaired
read2Fastq - Fastq file containing read2 if paired or null if unpaired
outSamFile - Output sam file
outUnalignedFastq - Output fastq file for unaligned reads or null
bowtie2Executable - Bowtie2 executable
bsubOutDir - Output directory for bsub file
Returns:
The bsub job ID
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException

runBowtie2

public static java.lang.String runBowtie2(java.lang.String bowtie2IndexBase,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> options,
                                          java.lang.String read1Fastq,
                                          java.lang.String read2Fastq,
                                          java.lang.String outSamFile,
                                          java.lang.String outUnalignedFastq,
                                          java.lang.String bowtie2Executable,
                                          java.lang.String bsubOutDir,
                                          boolean readsPaired)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
Run bowtie2 with paired reads and specified max insert size

Parameters:
bowtie2IndexBase - Index filename prefix (minus trailing .X.bt2)
options - Bowtie2 option flags and values
read1Fastq - Fastq file containing read1 if paired or single end reads if unpaired
read2Fastq - Fastq file containing read2 if paired or null if unpaired
outSamFile - Output sam file
outUnalignedFastq - Output fastq file for unaligned reads or null
bowtie2Executable - Bowtie2 executable
bsubOutDir - Output directory for bsub files
readsPaired - Whether the reads are paired
Returns:
The bsub job ID
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
